structure.unit: A JUDICIAL SUPPORT AGENCIES AND PERSONNEL

law.catch_line: Court disposition level relating to type of trial.
law.text:
The court disposition level of the system shall consist of at least the following information as relates to the type of trial:
Jury trial; or
Trial before the judge.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1986.
